data.title: Alpha Markets
data.meta_description: Alpha Markets aims to develop successful Leaders within the Trading Community.
data.text:
Risk Disclosure and Warning Notice: Trading forex and CFD's on margin carries a high level of risk, and may not be suitable for all investors. The high degree of leverage can work against you as well as for you. Before deciding to trade forex and CFD's you should carefully consider your investment objectives, level of experience, and risk appetite. The possibility exists that you could sustain a loss of some or all of your initial investment and therefore you should not invest money that you cannot afford to lose. You should be aware of all the risks associated with forex and CFD trading, and seek advice from an independent financial advisor if you have any doubts. Disclaimer: Kindly note that Alpha Markets does not offer services to US investors. Additionally, under no conditions is scalping permissible. LEGAL AND REGULATION: Alpha Markets SA (Pty) Ltd trading as AlphaMarketsSA is incorporated in South Africa with registration number 2022/550358/07 and is a duly appointed juristic representative of Pal Life (Pty) Ltd, South Africa, with company number 2020/577727/07, an authorised financial services provider, licensed and regulated by the Financial Sector Conduct Authority (FSCA) in South Africa, with FSP No. 43259. Alpha Markets SA, a duly appointed juristic representative of Pal Life (Pty) Ltd is the platform that Clients use to trade derivatives that are issued by Neo Brokers Namibia (Pty) Ltd, a company established and operating from the Republic of Namibia, with company number 2022/0418 and registered address 19, Palladium Street, Prosperita, Windhoek, Namibia, the counterparty and principal to the contract for difference purchased by you (the Client). Alpha Markets SA a juristic representative of Pal Life (Pty) Ltd acts as the intermediary and facilitator between you (the Client) and Neo Brokers Namibia (the Counterparty).*
